mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_purchasedoc (ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, BUYUNIT, BUYTIME, MONEY, STATUS, OPINION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, BUYUNIT, BUYTIME, MONEY, STATUS, OPINION from t_wms_purchasedoc
